Key Match Events: Kieffer Moore scored inside the opening minute
Harry Wilson's stunning long-range effort doubled Wales' advantage two minutes later
Driton Camaj pulled one back for Montenegro deep into the second half
Pre-Game Insights: Craig Bellamy made five alterations from the previous match
Ollie Cooper and Lewis Koumas started from the off for the first time
Aaron Ramsey and Sorba Thomas were brought on as substitutes
Moore started at number nine despite a wild performance in the previous match
Post-Match Reflections: Wales secured their first win under Craig Bellamy
Bellamy expressed satisfaction with the progress made under his leadership
Conditions were challenging due to heavy rain
Miscellaneous Highlights: Stevan Jovetic's effort from the halfway line came back off the crossbar early in the first half
Vladimir Jovovic also curled an effort against the woodwork after the interval
Connor Roberts was forced to pull out just before the break, making way for Brennan Johnson
